examples.user_input:
user_request:Ciao, sono Marco, cosa posso mangiare oggi?.
name:Marco,
calories:1800,
proteins:60,
carbs:200,
fats:50,
allergies: eggs, shellfish
examples.queries:
MATCH (u:User {{name: 'Marco'}})-[:HAS_FABBISOGNO]->(f:Fabbisogno) OPTIONAL MATCH (u)-[:IS_ALLERGIC_TO]->(a:Allergen) RETURN u.name AS name, f.calories AS daily_calories, f.proteins AS daily_proteins, f.carbs AS daily_carbs, f.fats AS daily_fats, COLLECT(a.name) AS allergies;,
MATCH (u:User {{name: 'Marco'}}) MATCH (r:Recipe) WHERE NOT EXISTS {{ MATCH (r)-[:HAS_ALLERGEN]->(a:Allergen) MATCH (u)-[:IS_ALLERGIC_TO]->(a) }} RETURN r.name AS dish, r.type AS type, r.calories AS calories, r.proteins AS proteins, r.carbs AS carbs, r.fats AS fats ORDER BY r.type;
examples.explanation: Ciao Marco, ho escluso gli alimenti contenenti uova e crostacei per proporti un menu adatto.

examples.user_input:
user_request:Ciao, sono Sara, cosa posso mangiare oggi?.
name:Sara,
calories:1500,
proteins:50,
carbs:180,
fats:40,
allergies: dairy
examples.queries:
MATCH (u:User {{name: 'Sara'}})-[:HAS_FABBISOGNO]->(f:Fabbisogno) OPTIONAL MATCH (u)-[:IS_ALLERGIC_TO]->(a:Allergen) RETURN u.name AS name, f.calories AS daily_calories, f.proteins AS daily_proteins, f.carbs AS daily_carbs, f.fats AS daily_fats, COLLECT(a.name) AS allergies;,
MATCH (u:User {{name: 'Sara'}}) MATCH (r:Recipe) WHERE NOT EXISTS {{ MATCH (r)-[:HAS_ALLERGEN]->(a:Allergen) MATCH (u)-[:IS_ALLERGIC_TO]->(a) }} RETURN r.name AS dish, r.type AS type, r.calories AS calories, r.proteins AS proteins, r.carbs AS carbs, r.fats AS fats ORDER BY r.type;
examples.explanation: Ciao Sara, ho rimosso tutte le ricette contenenti latticini per rispettare la tua allergia.

MATCH (u:User {{name: 'Lorenzo'}}) MATCH (r:Recipe) WHERE NOT EXISTS {{ MATCH (r)-[:HAS_ALLERGEN]->(a:Allergen) MATCH (u)-[:IS_ALLERGIC_TO]->(a) }} RETURN r.name AS dish, r.type AS type, r.calories AS calories, r.proteins AS proteins, r.carbs AS carbs, r.fats AS fats ORDER BY r.type;

examples.user_input:
user_request:Ciao, sono Giulia, cosa posso mangiare oggi?.
name:Giulia,
calories:1800,
proteins:60,
carbs:200,
fats:50,
allergies: peanuts, sesame
examples.queries:
MATCH (u:User {{name: 'Giulia'}})-[:HAS_FABBISOGNO]->(f:Fabbisogno) OPTIONAL MATCH (u)-[:IS_ALLERGIC_TO]->(a:Allergen) RETURN u.name AS name, f.calories AS daily_calories, f.proteins AS daily_proteins, f.carbs AS daily_carbs, f.fats AS daily_fats, COLLECT(a.name) AS allergies;,
MATCH (u:User {{name: 'Giulia'}}) MATCH (r:Recipe) WHERE NOT EXISTS {{ MATCH (r)-[:HAS_ALLERGEN]->(a:Allergen) MATCH (u)-[:IS_ALLERGIC_TO]->(a) }} RETURN r.name AS dish, r.type AS type, r.calories AS calories, r.proteins AS proteins, r.carbs AS carbs, r.fats AS fats ORDER BY r.type;
examples.explanation: Ciao Giulia, ho filtrato le ricette per escludere quelle contenenti arachidi e sesamo.

examples.user_input:
user_request: Ciao, sono Emma, posso mangiare il risotto ai funghi?.
recipe_name: risotto ai funghi,
type: primo,
calories: 450,
proteins: 15,
carbs: 60,
fats: 15,
allergens: dairy
examples.queries: MATCH (r:Recipe {{name: 'risotto ai funghi'}}) OPTIONAL MATCH (u:User {{name: 'Emma'}})-[:IS_ALLERGIC_TO]->(a:Allergen)<-[:HAS_ALLERGEN]-(r) RETURN r, collect(a) AS allergens
examples.explanation: Ciao Emma, il risotto ai funghi contiene latticini. Dato che sei allergica, ti consiglio di scegliere un piatto alternativo. Fammi sapere se hai bisogno di suggerimenti!

examples.user_input:
user_request: Ciao, sono Luca, posso mangiare il pollo al curry?.
recipe_name: pollo al curry,
type: secondo,
calories: 600,
proteins: 45,
carbs: 20,
fats: 30,
allergens: soy
examples.queries: MATCH (r:Recipe {{name: 'pollo al curry'}}) OPTIONAL MATCH (u:User {{name: 'Luca'}})-[:IS_ALLERGIC_TO]->(a:Allergen)<-[:HAS_ALLERGEN]-(r) RETURN r, collect(a) AS allergens
examples.explanation: Ciao Luca, il pollo al curry contiene soia, che potrebbe non essere adatto a te se sei allergico. Posso proporti delle alternative che rispettano le tue necessitÃ ?
